We propose recruit 8 independent full service restaurant , either without exist child menu . Recruitment occur wave two restaurant per wave total four wave . Restaurants match key criterion whether child menu restaurant size base seating ( categorize small -to- medium large ) . Matched restaurant randomize either 8 -- week menu -- intervention menu -- plus intervention occur time . The menu -- intervention involve work restaurant add new healthy child menu item menu . The menu -- plus intervention involve work restaurant add new healthy child menu item tailor menu , along promotional material restaurant employee training encourage customer select menu item . Additionally , biweekly observation customer interview restaurant one month pre -- intervention phase , 8 -- week intervention period , one month post-intervention phase capture order place order report consumed child . We also assess feasibility fidelity intervention use manager interview data ( baseline post -- intervention ) , restaurants audit ( baseline , intervention , post -- intervention ) , process evaluation measure ( weekly 8-week intervention ) . This study present minimal risk participant .
DOC.criteria: For customer observation interview : Restaurant din party least one adult 18 old one child party appear age 317 year Dining party include six people Party speak English and/or Spanish Party speak English and/or Spanish Parties large six people For restaurant manager interview : At least 18 year age Has work restaurant least 4 month Works least 20 hour per week restaurant Plans continue work restaurant least 6 month Speaks write English and/or Spanish
